mapper.select: SELECT tp.id,tt.name,tt.age,tp.type,tp.relationUserId as userId,tt.avatar,tt.gender FROM group_relation tp INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM user WHERE isDelete=0) tt ON tp.relationUserId=tt.id WHERE groupId=#{groupId} ORDER BY type DESC

SELECT tp.id,tt.name,td.count,tt.avatar,CASE WHEN tc.comment IS null then 0 ELSE tc.comment END as comment FROM group_relation tp INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM user WHERE isDelete=0) tt ON tp.relationUserId=tt.id INNER JOIN (SELECT phone,COUNT(*) AS count FROM jfhealth GROUP BY phone) td ON substring(td.phone,9)=tp.relationUserId LEFT JOIN (SELECT userId,COUNT(comment) as comment FROM comment GROUP BY userId) tc ON tp.relationUserId=tc.userId WHERE groupId=#{groupId} AND tp.type=0
select * from group_relation where groupId=#{groupId} and relationUserId=#{relationUserId}
mapper.delete: delete from group_relation where groupId=#{groupId} and relationUserId=#{relationUserId}
